it.unipi.cds.federatedLearning.node

Class NodeCommunicationModelHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipi.cds.federatedLearning.CommunicationModelHandler
      • it.unipi.cds.federatedLearning.node.NodeCommunicationModelHandler

  • public class NodeCommunicationModelHandler
extends CommunicationModelHandler
    This class handles the Node side communication between Sink and Node

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class it.unipi.cds.federatedLearning.CommunicationModelHandler

        channelNodeSink, channelRPC, channelSinkNode, factory, NODE_TO_SINK_QUEUE_NAME, receiver, RPC_NODE_TO_SINK_QUEUE_NAME, SINK_TO_NODE_EXCHANGE_NAME

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String callFunction(java.lang.String function)
      Call a Remote Procedure implemented by the Sink
      int getNodeID()
      Get the Identification number of this node
      protected void initNodeToSink()
      Initialize a queue for the communication from Node to Sink.
      protected void initRPC()
      Initialize a Remote Procedure Call mechanism to add a new node to the pool Sink Side: run a RPCServer thread that listens to nodes' registration requests Node Side: call the Remote Procedure and assign the response to the nodeID
      void initSinkToNode()
      Initialize an exchange for the communication from Sink to Node.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Run a NodeCommunicationHandler for testing purposes, the main class of the node is DataCollector.java
      void receiveModel(Model deliveredModel)
      Receive a model Sink Side: a new model arrived on the NodeToSink queue Node Side: a new updated model has been published on the SinkToNode exchange
      void sendModel()
      Send a model Sink Side: publish an updated Model on the SinkToNode exchange Node Side: put the new model in the NodeToSink queue

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getNodeID

        public int getNodeID()
        Get the Identification number of this node

      • initRPC

        protected void initRPC()
        Initialize a Remote Procedure Call mechanism to add a new node to the pool
        • Sink Side: run a RPCServer thread that listens to nodes' registration requests
        • Node Side: call the Remote Procedure and assign the response to the nodeID
        Specified by:
        initRPC in class CommunicationModelHandler

      • initNodeToSink

        protected void initNodeToSink()
        Initialize a queue for the communication from Node to Sink.
        • Sink Side: start to consume arriving Models in the queue
        • Node Side: just declare the queue that will be used to send Model to the Sink
        Specified by:
        initNodeToSink in class CommunicationModelHandler

      • initSinkToNode

        public void initSinkToNode()
        Initialize an exchange for the communication from Sink to Node.
        • Sink Side: just declare the exchange on which updated Models will be published
        • Node Side: get a temporary queue and bind it to the exchange, then start consuming the arriving Models
        Specified by:
        initSinkToNode in class CommunicationModelHandler

      • receiveModel

        public void receiveModel(Model deliveredModel)
        Receive a model
        • Sink Side: a new model arrived on the NodeToSink queue
        • Node Side: a new updated model has been published on the SinkToNode exchange
        Specified by:
        receiveModel in class CommunicationModelHandler
        Parameters:
        deliveredModel - received Model

      • sendModel

        public void sendModel()
        Send a model
        • Sink Side: publish an updated Model on the SinkToNode exchange
        • Node Side: put the new model in the NodeToSink queue
        Specified by:
        sendModel in class CommunicationModelHandler

      • callFunction

        public java.lang.String callFunction(java.lang.String function)
                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                     java.lang.InterruptedException
        Call a Remote Procedure implemented by the Sink
        Returns:
        function's response
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Run a NodeCommunicationHandler for testing purposes, the main class of the node is DataCollector.java
